findings.title: Missing event for changing registered contracts
findings.description: Changing critical values should be followed by the event emitting for better tracking off-chain.
findings.function: registerContract, unregisterContract, enableDebugMode, disableDebugMode, updateStakingCompoundingPeriodsPerYear, addTokenToBondingList, addMultipleTokensToBondingList, removeTokenFromBondingList, removeMultipleTokensToBondingList, addBondType, removeBondType, setBondingMultiplierFor

findings.title: A public function that could be declared external
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: State variables that could be declared constant
findings.description: Add the constant attributes to state variables that never change.
